txt.en:
'Dor-en-Ernil is under siege! We warriors are few in this region and I fear we may not live to see the dust settle over the Dor-en-Ernil dunes.

'Have you seen the beasts the Haradrim keep in their ranks? These powerful half-trolls frighten even the bravest Gondorian warrior. I hear they have the strength of three men!

'Defeating these vile, brutish creatures may help us secure victory!'

<rgb=#FF0000>This bounty can only be completed a maximum of three times.</rgb>
Glírdor is in Erchar's encampment in Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nYou should speak with Glírdor.
Erchar's warriors hope to stem the tide of Haradrim troops by decimating the numbers of powerful half-trolls in their ranks.

'You have fought these beasts up close? I hear their sword can cleave men in two! You are indeed a skilled warrior.\n\n'I thank you for defeating many half-trolls in Dor-en-Ernil. For Gondor, my friend!'
Half-trolls can be found throughout Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nDefeat half-trolls in Dor-en-Ernil.
